case_circumstances: The decedent is found in the Delaware River by the United States Coast Guard near an area known as Penn Treaty Park, located at 1199 N. Delaware Ave., Philadelphia, PA 19125. He is moderately decomposed with effects of prolonged immersion evidenced by bloating, dark discoloration, and extensive skin slippage. The temperature at the time of discovery and the week preceding was near the upper 90?s.
